com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server.capabilities

Interface ServerCapabilities

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullServerCapabilities, ServerCapabilitiesImpl

    public interface ServerCapabilities
    The capabilities for a specific Acrolinx Server. Displays the available
    • languages
    • rule sets
    • check settings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ServerCapabilities NULL
      The NULL object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<LanguageCapabilities> getLanguageCapabilities() 
      LanguageCapabilities getLanguageCapability(Language lang) 
      boolean isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported()
      In newer versions of Acrolinx you can flag admitted terms separately from deprecated and valid terms.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final ServerCapabilities NULL
        The NULL object.

    • Method Detail

      • getLanguageCapabilities

        Set<LanguageCapabilities> getLanguageCapabilities()
        Returns:
        the language capabilities for all running language servers

      • getLanguageCapability

        LanguageCapabilities getLanguageCapability(Language lang)
        Parameters:
        lang - the language object containing the two letter language code
        Returns:
        the language capability in the given language or NULL if no language server for this language is available

      • isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported

        boolean isCustomAdmittedTermStateSupported()
        In newer versions of Acrolinx you can flag admitted terms separately from deprecated and valid terms. You can also customize the name of the admitted term status.
        Returns:
        true, if the server supports the customized admitted term state
